name: Fart game demo
description:
This is a project I've been working on for a large portion of the year.

Unfortunately due to laziness and lack of motivation, I decided to stop development to focus on other things.

This game is a bit unstable at times so don't expect smooth gameplay.

Might come back to this in the future.

Controls

WASD / Arrow keys / OKL;
MoveSpace / Enter
AttackEscapePauseF3Resize window
